name: 3D Startrek
overview: A text-graphics game based on the Star Trek television show. This cassette contained two versions of the game. A version of 3D Star Trek for the original PET 2001 firmware. The battle stations have better graphics than the version for newer ROMs and the excellent 3D Star Trek by M P McDonald and M H Clements for 3000 series 40-column PETs. Does not fully work on the 4000 series, and not at all on the 8000 series.
